data.text: this was our second visit to the blue sky and as always the service from staff and management was second to none very helpful ,polite, and most of all always with a smile .the rooms have been upgraded to deluxe rooms now and are very clean cleaners come in every day .We had seaview rooms on both visits and come equipt with tea/coffee ,kettle and a mini fridge walk in shower w/c sink cupboards for storage and clothes rail there are safes in all the rooms we never needed it . The bar area is a plesant place just tosit and have a drink aswell as bar snacks which are reasonable prices so enjoy your stay there we certainly did.
data.title: Return visit

data.text:
A FABULOUS HOTEL TO STAY
My Wife & myself stayed at the Blue Sky Hotel, Rhodes,  in the last 2 weeks of October '23.  We were switched to this hotel, because our allocated hotel could not provide the accommodation we required as it was closing early (end of Season) 
And were we glad we were switched
The Hotel, the Management, the staff were just fabulous......
We had a 4th Floor, Sea View Room with panoramic uninterrupted views of the Mediterranean with the most astonishing sunsets every night.   The room was spacious, contemporary  furnishings, stylish bathroom & shower, very comfortable large bed with  the fridge and the air conditioning  working (which we find to be rare nowadays)  which reflected the whole style of the hotel which was clean, contemporary styles and well managed

in fact the management & staff really made this holiday one of the best holidays we have had
We were made so welcome by the whole Hotel stall from the General Mgr. down to the room cleaner who was an absolute delight to see every day with the biggest smile & greeting and of course  our obligatory "Greek word for the day" what a treasure she was
The Bar staff and in particular the Restaurant Staff were exceptional, so attentive, so friendly, anything we wanted was attended to  as we also noted with other guests at the hotel, the stall friendliness was noted by all, nothing was too much trouble.

The reception staff were of the same 'ilke'  very helpful very friendly and created a great atmosphere we just felt so comfortable at the hotel  

Michaël the General Mgr. was a delightful man with an engaging personality who had a very active/presence in the hotel with his attentiveness to all the guests, we certainly enjoyed his encounters with ourselves, remarkable memory for guests names etc.  we were very impressed 
Staff to note:   George the Restaurant Mgr.  with his knowledge of wines and professional  service, was impressive, the personal service from the floor staff was so friendly and proficient it made every meal time a pleasurable event.  
Special mention to the Maître d   (Voula)  she had the biggest smile, always took her time to ask about our day and was exceptionally pleasant in the way she interacted with us and other hotel guests,  again a very engaging young lady perfectly placed to be the Maître d.
All in all a fabulous holiday for my wife and myself and I can strongly recommend this Hotel which played a major part of our experience during our stay.   
The hotel itself is perfectly placed to access the Old Town, The Harbour/Port  and the New Town all within easy walking distance  (or Taxi for the trip back ha!)
Well done the 'Blue Sky Hotel'   and Jet2
data.title: A FABULOUS HOTEL TO STAY

data.text: What a lovely break my husband and I had. The hotel had a lovely decor... scandi, and very clean. All staff worked really hard and were very welcoming, under the charge of lovely Michael. The hotel was gearing down for their winter closing but were still attentive to the last 5 guests. It is well situated for a walk to the town and beach. We intend to make this our go to place to stay when returning to Rhodes
data.title: Lovely  hotel and staff

data.text:
As a first time traveller I was a bit worried being on my own but from day 1 the manager and all the  staff made me feel very welcome and nothing too much for them. They also advised on places to go and visit. My room was always cleaned daily.
I went B&B but sometimes popped in for a meal at hotel which was buffet style so eat as much or as less as wanted.
Will definitely be back
data.title: SAD TO BE LEAVING

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Anmarie,
Thrilled to read that you enjoyed our hospitality and how your initial hesitation, being a solo traveler, vanished straight from the start of your holiday. Your well-being is very important for us. Happy to realize that you enjoyed some of our dinner options. Every guest is welcome to visit the restaurant for dinner, those who have booked it in advance (half board) and also those who are only on bed and breakfast, by paying the charge straight at the waiting staff. We are looking forward to your return visit!
owner_response.author: Eleftheria Mentou

data.text:
Good location & on the whole a nice hotel. Staff at the hotel were lovely & rooms were well serviced everyday. However the pool area is dirty. The pool is dirty & all sides of the pool troughs are thick with black slime. Nobody cleans or brushes it away. Full responsibility sits with the manager who clearly thinks that it us acceptable to have holiday makers sit around the focal point of the pool looking at the black sludge. 

Black sludge does not just appear over a few days. I've seen other posts mention it too. The hot breakfast options are odd. Sweetcorn & peas, tomatoes with grated cheese, sliced up hotdog & boiled ham. Clearly the leftovers from the previous evening. Continental options are better. 

I would go again if Jet2.com guaranteed that the black pool slime was cleaned away.
data.title: Nice hotel but pool area is dirty

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Laura,

We would like to thank you for your review and inform you that our final remaining hotel room and pool area refurbishment will be completed the upcoming off season period (winter months). The pool area will obtain a different look after its complete renovation. Hope you understand that this takes time and has to be organized before the rainy season begins. Furthermore, we will take your remarks regarding the hot breakfast options into serious consideration in order to satisfy our guest’s needs and habits. We hope you will honor us with a future return visit to witness the changes that will take place!
owner_response.author: Eleftheria Mentou
